title: Bug 4329 - No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329 - No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
EB: The search should display the relevant results when searching via Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Right-click on a package and select the search option.
3. Enter a search term.
4. Observe that no results are displayed.
